doc:
Téa Leoni https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/T%C3%A9a_Leoni 0 Elizabeth Téa Pantaleoni (; born February 25, 1966), better known by her stage name Téa Leoni, is an American actress and producer. In her early career, Leoni starred in the television sitcoms Flying Blind (1992–93) and The Naked Truth (1995–98). Her breakthrough role was in the 1995 action comedy film Bad Boys. In later years, Leoni had the female lead roles in films including Deep Impact (1998), The Family Man (2000), Jurassic Park III (2001), and Fun with Dick and Jane (2005). In 2014, Leoni returned to television with the leading role in the CBS political drama series Madam Secretary. Elizabeth_Téa_Pantaleoni ( ; born February_25_,_1966 ) , better_known by her_stage_name_Téa_Leoni , is an_American_actress_and_producer . In her_early_career , Leoni starred in the_television_sitcoms Flying_Blind_(_1992 – 93_) and The_Naked_Truth_(_1995 – 98 ) . Her_breakthrough_role was in the_1995_action_comedy_film_Bad_Boys . In later_years , Leoni had the_female_lead_roles in films including Deep_Impact_(_1998_) , The_Family_Man_(_2000_)_,_Jurassic_Park_III_(_2001_) , and Fun with Dick_and_Jane_(_2005_) . In 2014 , Leoni returned to television with the_leading_role in the_CBS_political_drama_series_Madam_Secretary .
